Schema: {"typeName":"Fastly::Logging::S3","description":"Manage a Fastly service","sourceUrl":"https://developer.fastly.com/reference/api/logging/s3/","definitions":{"FastlyAccess":{"description":"Properties needed to access Fastly.","type":"object","properties":{"Token":{"type":"string","description":"API token used to access Fastly"}},"required":["Token"],"additionalProperties":false}},"typeConfiguration":{"properties":{"FastlyAccess":{"$ref":"#/definitions/FastlyAccess"}},"additionalProperties":false,"required":["FastlyAccess"]},"properties":{"AccessKey":{"description":"The access key for your S3 account. Not required if iam_role is provided.","type":"string"},"Acl":{"description":"The access control list (ACL) specific request header","type":"string"},"BucketName":{"description":"The bucket name for S3 account.","type":"string"},"CompressionCodec":{"description":"The codec used for compressing your logs.","type":"string","enum":["zstd","snappy","gzip"]},"Domain":{"description":"The domain of the Amazon S3 endpoint.","type":"string"},"Format":{"description":"A Fastly log format string.","type":"string"},"FormatVersion":{"description":"The version of the custom logging format used for the configured endpoint.","type":"integer","enum":[1,2]},"GzipLevel":{"description":"The level of gzip encoding when sending logs (default 0, no compression).","type":"integer","default":0},"IamRole":{"description":"The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the IAM role granting Fastly access to S3. Not required if access_key and secret_key are provided.","type":"string"},"MessageType":{"description":"How the message should be formatted. [Default classic]","type":"string","enum":["classic","loggly","logplex","blank"]},"Name":{"description":"The name for the real-time logging configuration.","type":"string"},"Path":{"description":"The path to upload logs to.","type":"string"},"Period":{"description":"How frequently log files are finalized so they can be available for reading (in seconds).","type":"integer","default":3600},"Placement":{"description":"Where in the generated VCL the logging call should be placed.","type":"string","enum":["none","waf_debug"]},"PublicKey":{"description":"A PGP public key that Fastly will use to encrypt your log files before writing them to disk.","type":"string"},"Redundancy":{"description":"The S3 redundancy level","type":"string"},"ResponseCondition":{"description":"The name of an existing condition in the configured endpoint, or leave blank to always execute.","type":"string"},"SecretKey":{"description":"The secret key for your S3 account. Not required if iam_role is provided.","type":"string"},"ServerSideEncryption":{"description":"Set this to AES256 or aws:kms to enable S3 Server Side Encryption.","type":"string"},"ServerSideEncryptionKmsKeyId":{"description":"Optional server-side KMS Key Id. Must be set if server_side_encryption is set to aws:kms or AES256.","type":"string"},"CreatedAt":{"description":"Date and time in ISO 8601 format. Read-only.","type":"string","format":"date-time"},"DeletedAt":{"description":"Date and time in ISO 8601 format. Read-only.","type":"string","format":"date-time"},"ServiceId":{"description":"Alphanumeric string identifying the service. Read-only.","type":"string"},"UpdatedAt":{"description":"Date and time in ISO 8601 format. Read-only.","type":"string","format":"date-time"},"VersionId":{"description":"Id identifying the service version.","type":"number"},"Version":{"description":"Integer identifying a domain version. Read-only.","type":"string"}},"additionalProperties":false,"required":["BucketName"],"primaryIdentifier":["/properties/ServiceId","/properties/Name"],"readOnlyProperties":["/properties/CreatedAt","/properties/DeletedAt","/properties/UpdatedAt"],"createOnlyProperties":["/properties/ServiceId","/properties/VersionId","/properties/Name"],"handlers":{"create":{"permissions":[]},"read":{"permissions":[]},"update":{"permissions":[]},"delete":{"permissions":[]},"list":{"permissions":[]}}}
